Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Controller

Class GigaController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Controller.GigaController
public class GigaController extends Object
The GigaController class manages multiple game controllers and handles player connections, disconnections, and game creation
